approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of a spender.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address.

setTaxHandler.description: Sets a new address for the tax handler.

setTreasuryHandler.description: Sets a new address for the treasury handler.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend from the owner's account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to represent the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoint information (block number and votes) for an account at a specific block number.

delegates.description: Returns the delegate address for a specified account.

getVotesAtBlock.description: Returns the number of votes an account had at a specific block number.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce for a specific account, used in delegation.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a specific account.

taxHandler.description: Returns the address of the tax handler contract.

treasuryHandler.description: Returns the address of the treasury handler contract.
